data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Imereti words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Imereti, Georgia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Imereti to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary: On average, 76 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Imereti, Georgia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Imereti, Georgia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Imereti.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Laz, Lazuri people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Imereti hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Imereti.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Imereti, Georgia has a population of 703,500.

We estimate Imereti has 9,540 people who might know Jesus, 556,473 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 137,487 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 73 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Imereti that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.
